feed.title: Fitbit Health Dashboard Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Fitbit Health Dashboard: v1.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow use of environment variables for defining configuration values. by @moorecp in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/1
  • Adds files to launch full stack with docker-compose by @jtbrush56 in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/2
  • Add simple grafana dashboard for influxdb 2 by @20chan in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/9

New Contributors

  • @moorecp made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/1
  • @jtbrush56 made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/2
  • @20chan made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/9

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/commits/v1.0.0

entry.title: New release for Fitbit Health Dashboard:
New release for Fitbit Health Dashboard: v1.1.0
entry.content:
New Features

  • Support for GPS data visualization (requires updated Grafana supporting Geomap plugin) for the recorded activity. This GPS data visual is better than the default Fitbit app as it shows the detailed route colored by your Heart rate values and you can also see the speed from the thickness of the trace line.

  • Support for fetching BMI and Weight data (the weight data is recorded as Pounds in the database - converted to Kg in Grafana Visual) - These data types require manual logging and you will not have these measurements if you have no records for the fetched period of data

  • Upgraded visual for Heart Rate data colored by threshold - switched to time series from bar chart

  • removal of deprecated panels
  • Added last sync time visual for quick glance

  • Upgraded visual for device battery level colored by threshold

What's Changed

  • feat: add most feature of influx v1 to the influx v2 by @Belphemur in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/13
  • Update actions/checkout to v4 and replace docker-compose with docker compose by @Niggggggo in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/21
  • fix: use bucket var by @sam-don in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/33
  • Add other fields from GPS data by @dipanghosh in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/37

New Contributors

  • @Belphemur made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/13
  • @Niggggggo made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/21
  • @sam-don made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/33
  • @dipanghosh made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/pull/37

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/public-fitbit-projects/compare/v1.0.1...v1.1.0
